divs: sighting detailswhile out filming in a big field 4 or more pulsing orbs slowly move into triangle formation and remain there for a few min. my husband was a witness as well. there was a lot of activity and has been here in nj since may. we had our 1st ( with our entire family while in car )sighting of a black triangle that traveled along side of us for about 2 mi. while driving on rt. 517 .( no camera ) we have been looking in the skies and filming ever since. we have more to view on you tube mi8kie8865. here is another triangle formation at a quarry..... http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=zxyqr68up2o&feature=relatedthis is happening all over ....
Summary: 3 then 4 pulsing orbs form triangle while hovering
